cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("Projucer")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../../cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED Projucer_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "Projucer_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(Projucer_jucer_FILE
  "${Projucer_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)


jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_FORMAT_VERSION "1"
  PROJECT_FILE "${Projucer_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "M70qfTRRk"
)

  PROJECT_NAME "Projucer"
  PROJECT_VERSION "6.0.8"
  COMPANY_NAME "Raw Material Software Limited"
  COMPANY_COPYRIGHT "Raw Material Software Limited"

  x         .         .         "Source/Utility/Helpers/jucer_VersionInfo.cpp"
  .         .         .         "Source/Utility/Helpers/jucer_VersionInfo.h"
)

jucer_project_files("Projucer/Utility/PIPs"
# Compile   Xcode     Binary    File
#           Resource  Resource
  x         .         .         "Source/Utility/PIPs/jucer_PIPGenerator.cpp"
  .         .         .         "Source/Utility/PIPs/jucer_PIPGenerator.h"
)

)

)

jucer_project_module(
  juce_build_tools
  PATH "../Build"
)

jucer_project_module(
  juce_core
  PATH "../../modules"
  # JUCE_FORCE_DEBUG
  JUCE_LOG_ASSERTIONS ON
  # JUCE_CHECK_MEMORY_LEAKS
  # JUCE_DONT_AUTOLINK_TO_WIN32_LIBRARIES
  # JUCE_INCLUDE_ZLIB_CODE
  JUCE_USE_CURL ON
  JUCE_LOAD_CURL_SYMBOLS_LAZILY ON
  # JUCE_CATCH_UNHANDLED_EXCEPTIONS
  JUCE_ALLOW_STATIC_NULL_VARIABLES OFF
  JUCE_STRICT_REFCOUNTEDPOINTER ON
  # JUCE_ENABLE_ALLOCATION_HOOKS
)

jucer_project_module(
  juce_cryptography
  PATH "../../modules"
)

jucer_project_module(
  juce_data_structures
  PATH "../../modules"
)

jucer_project_module(
  juce_events
  PATH "../../modules"
  # JUCE_EXECUTE_APP_SUSPEND_ON_BACKGROUND_TASK
)

jucer_project_module(
  juce_graphics
  PATH "../../modules"
  # JUCE_USE_COREIMAGE_LOADER
  # JUCE_USE_DIRECTWRITE
  # JUCE_DISABLE_COREGRAPHICS_FONT_SMOOTHING
)

jucer_project_module(
  juce_gui_basics
  PATH "../../modules"
  # JUCE_ENABLE_REPAINT_DEBUGGING
  # JUCE_USE_XRANDR
  # JUCE_USE_XINERAMA
  # JUCE_USE_XSHM
  # JUCE_USE_XRENDER
  # JUCE_USE_XCURSOR
  # JUCE_WIN_PER_MONITOR_DPI_AWARE
)

jucer_project_module(
  juce_gui_extra
  PATH "../../modules"
  JUCE_WEB_BROWSER OFF
  # JUCE_USE_WIN_WEBVIEW2
  # JUCE_ENABLE_LIVE_CONSTANT_EDITOR
)

jucer_export_target(
  "Xcode (MacOSX)"
  ICON_SMALL "Source/BinaryData/Icons/juce_icon.png"
  ICON_LARGE "Source/BinaryData/Icons/juce_icon.png"
  DOCUMENT_FILE_EXTENSIONS
    ".jucer"
  MICROPHONE_ACCESS ON
  CAMERA_ACCESS ON
  EXTRA_SYSTEM_FRAMEWORKS
    "AudioUnit"
    "Accelerate"
    "AVFoundation"
    "CoreAudio"
    "CoreAudioKit"
    "CoreMIDI"
    "DiscRecording"
    "QuartzCore"
    "AudioToolbox"
    "OpenGL"
    "QTKit"
    "QuickTime"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Xcode (MacOSX)"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  ADD_RECOMMENDED_COMPILER_WARNING_FLAGS "Enabled"
  CXX_LIBRARY "LLVM libc++"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Xcode (MacOSX)"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  LINK_TIME_OPTIMISATION OFF
  ADD_RECOMMENDED_COMPILER_WARNING_FLAGS "Enabled"
  CXX_LIBRARY "LLVM libc++"
)

jucer_export_target(
  "Visual Studio 2015"
  EXTRA_COMPILER_FLAGS
    "/bigobj"
  ICON_SMALL "Source/BinaryData/Icons/juce_icon.png"
  ICON_LARGE "Source/BinaryData/Icons/juce_icon.png"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Visual Studio 2015"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  RUNTIME_LIBRARY "Use DLL runtime"
  DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT "Program Database (/Zi)"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Visual Studio 2015"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  LINK_TIME_OPTIMISATION OFF
  RUNTIME_LIBRARY "Use static runtime"
  DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT "None"
)

jucer_export_target(
  "Visual Studio 2017"
  EXTRA_COMPILER_FLAGS
    "/w44265"
    "/w45038"
    "/w44062"
  ICON_SMALL "Source/BinaryData/Icons/juce_icon.png"
  ICON_LARGE "Source/BinaryData/Icons/juce_icon.png"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Visual Studio 2017"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  RUNTIME_LIBRARY "Use static runtime"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Visual Studio 2017"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  LINK_TIME_OPTIMISATION OFF
  OPTIMISATION "Maximise speed"
  RUNTIME_LIBRARY "Use static runtime"
  DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT "None"
)

    "/w44265"
    "/w45038"
    "/w44062"

  DEBUG_MODE OFF

  LINK_TIME_OPTIMISATION OFF

  DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT "None"
)

jucer_export_target(
  "Linux Makefile"
  ICON_SMALL "Source/BinaryData/Icons/juce_icon.png"
  ICON_LARGE "Source/BinaryData/Icons/juce_icon.png"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Linux Makefile"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Linux Makefile"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
)

jucer_project_end()
